font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 纯净的，未被文明腐蚀的： remaining in a pure state; uncorrupted by civilization. remaining free from dirt or decay; clean
【例】 a pristine forest 一片未被文明影响的森林
【近】 immaculate, spotless, stainless, unsoiled, unstained, unsullied
【反】 tainted, squalid, contaminated, besmirched ,corrupted by civilization 污染的，被文明腐蚀的
【记】 priest 牧师，牧师的作用是让人回到原始的纯洁状态
